Header.DownloadTitle: Download the latest release on GitHub!
Header.DownloadARIA: Click to open the release page on GitHub: allowing you to download the latest version of the algorithm
Header.PyPiTitle: Check out the project on PyPi!
Header.PyPiARIA: Click to open the project page on PyPi. PyPi is the official Python Package index
Header.RepoARIA: Click to visit the software repository on GitHub, in which all source code of this project can be found and downloaded
Header.LogoTitle: Click to return to the homepage
Header.LogoARIA: Click to return to the homepage
Header.LogoALT: The AvantZero Logo: the letter 'a', separated towards two distinct parts near the top of the character: giving off a modern futuristic vibe. The logo is made in a modern typeset

Footer.APPOVLogoARIA: The A Pixelated Point of View Logo
Footer.APPOVLogoALT: The A Pixelated Point of View Logo
Footer.LanguageThemeSettingsARIA: Click to change language and theme preferences
Footer.CopyrightARIA: Container with version and copyright information
Footer.CloseSettingsARIA: Click to close the settings menu

HomePage.LogoARIA: The white AvantZero logo on a black background
HomePage.QuickstartTitle: Concise information on getting the algorithm up and running quick!
HomePage.QuickstartARIA: Click the button to go to the quickstart page, containing information if you want to get the algorithm up and running fast!
HomePage.BackgroundTitle: Details on the origin and purpose of the algorithm
HomePage.BackgroundARIA: Click the button to go to the Background page, it contains information on the origin and purpose of the algorithm.
HomePage.RequirementsTitle: List of required software to run the algorithm properly
HomePage.RequirementsARIA: Click on the button to go to the Requirements page, which contains a list of software and hardware requirements to run the AvantZero algorithm properly.
HomePage.InstallationTitle: Step by step instructions on how to install the AvantZero algorithm
HomePage.InstallationARIA: Clicking on the button will open the Installation page, which contains step by step instructions on how to install the AvantZero algorithm
HomePage.ProjectManagerTitle: In-depth information regarding the Project Manager Core
HomePage.ProjectManagerARIA: Clicking this button opens the Project Manager page. This page contains in-depth and technical information behind the Project Manager used within the AvantZero algorithm.
